vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code:
function withdrawBalance() public {
        require(!locked[msg.sender]); // check if the user is not already withdrawing
        locked[msg.sender] = true; // set the user as withdrawing
        uint amountToWithdraw = userBalances[msg.sender];
        userBalances[msg.sender] = 0; // set user's balance to zero before the external call

        require(msg.sender.call.value(amountToWithdraw)()); // perform the external call

        locked[msg.sender] = false; // reset the user's withdrawing status
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in Reentrancy_cross_function.withdrawBalance (patch_8.sol#13-22):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(msg.sender.call.value(amountToWithdraw)()) (patch_8.sol#19)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- locked (patch_8.sol#21)

vulnerability_findings.name: erc20-interface
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy_cross_function (patch_8.sol#3-23) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (patch_8.sol#7-11)

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_8.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.0 (patch_8.sol#1): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code:
function withdrawBalance() public {
        require(!locked[msg.sender]); // check if the user is not already withdrawing
        locked[msg.sender] = true; // set the user as withdrawing
        uint amountToWithdraw = userBalances[msg.sender];
        userBalances[msg.sender] = 0; // set user's balance to zero before the external call

        require(msg.sender.call.value(amountToWithdraw)()); // perform the external call

        locked[msg.sender] = false; // reset the user's withdrawing status
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in Reentrancy_cross_function.withdrawBalance (patch_8.sol#13-22):
	-require(bool)(msg.sender.call.value(amountToWithdraw)()) patch_8.sol#19

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
